greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Smallest odd prime divisor of (2n+1)^2 + 1.
comment: If the map "x -> smallest odd prime divisor of n^2+1" is iterated, does it always terminate in the 2-cycle (5 <-> 13)? - _Zoran Sunic_, Oct 25 2017
A027862 is a subsequence. - _David A. Corneth_, Nov 04 2017
link: David A. Corneth, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Nov 04 2017, following a suggestion from _Zoran Sunic_.
